thread.title: Sitting in the middle of the leafy hub of Can Tho- wonderful views of the river
thread.title_full: Sitting in the middle of the leafy hub of Can Tho- wonderful views of the river

author: Goviet nam-2015-10-13T09:13:45-0400
title: Sitting in the middle of the leafy hub of Can Tho- wonderful views of the river
text:
Travel Articles | October 13, 2015 
Hotels in Cantho are passionate about Vietnam and Cambodia's rich culture, history, enchanting landscapes and most of all their smiling people. 
With a stay at Holiday Hotel in Can Tho, you'll be minutes from Ho Chi Minh Museum and Can Tho Museum. This hotel is within close proximity of Ong Pagoda and Ninh Kieu Park. Make yourself at home in one of the 52 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. 32-inch LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Pamper yourself with onsite massages or take in the view from a terrace. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/caf√©. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily. With convenient locations in Cai Khe Trade Center and Hau River along the gentle beauty. Holiday Can Tho Hotel is designed in contemporary style will attract you by luxury, stunning golden light. Here visitors will be memorable for quality staff development, gentle friendly smile greets visitors. 
Designed for both business and leisure travel with well-positioned in Ninh Kieu Quay / City Center, Anh Dao Mekong Hotel is a new 3* hotel that the ideal point of departure for your excursions in Can Tho. Only 1.1 km from the city center, the Anh Dao Mekong hotel's strategic location ensures that guests can quickly and easily reach many local points of interest. With its convenient location, Anh Dao Mekong offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations. 
Make yourself at home in one of the 33 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. 
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This hotel also features a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
